TopicTitle: Bill Kerman the longest space flight (at lest on this save file)

Articles.Content:
Bill had previously loot of problem with geting into orbit on LV-T45 "Swivel" in last stage unlike other Kerbals, but when i switched to LV-909 "Terrier" (experimental ;) ) he succeed get to over 1 000 000 apogee orbiting whole 3 Kebin days.

I had some problem with bringing him down he doesn't slow down enough in Kerbin atmosphere, he landed eventually but on second attempt i wonder what i did wrong?

[video=youtube;4HSFVjcWsZE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4HSFVjcWsZE[/video]
watch from 20 minute?
